events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your store but it doesn’t fit at all. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request related to a size problem with the purchased jacket.
Your case has been assigned to an agent specializing in refunds to assist you further.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your jacket. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm the condition of the jacket? Was it worn or damaged?
The order number is 4578392. The jacket is brand new and hasn’t been worn; I just tried it on once at home.
Thank you for the details. We can process a full refund for you once you return the jacket. I will send you the return shipping label shortly.
That sounds perfect. I appreciate the quick help and look forward to receiving the return label.
The return shipping label has been sent to your email. Once we receive the jacket, your refund will be processed within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm if you have sent the jacket back and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, I shipped the jacket yesterday using the label you sent. Thanks again for your support!
We have received the jacket and your refund has been processed. Please allow a few days for the amount to appear in your account.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to your email. We’d appreciate if you could share your feedback on our support today.
I completed the survey and rated your service very highly. Thank you for resolving my issue so smoothly.
Your case has been closed. Thank you for contacting us and have a great day!
